section.title: The search result view
section.para: The search result view () is at the bottom of the Functional Test Specification Perspective, under the editor area, and just behind the Problem View by default. If you perform searches, the results are shown here. For most searches, if you double-click on an item in the search result view, the corresponding item is highlighted in the Test Case Browser or Test Suite Browser. You can see a history of previous searches, and re-run them directly from within the view. You can also refresh the current search.
